affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 指在程度/尺寸方面"共同"

word_group.brief_definition: 私人信息发布栏；私人广告栏
答读者个人问题专栏；私事广告栏

bilingual.source: Please enter the data in the first column.
bilingual.target: 请将数据输入到第一列。

bilingual.source: The column headers need to be bolded for clarity.
bilingual.target: 为了清晰起见，列标题需要加粗。

bilingual.source: Each column in the database represents a different attribute.
bilingual.target: 数据库中的每一列代表一个不同的属性。

bilingual.source: The spreadsheet has a column for each month of the year.
bilingual.target: 电子表格中每个月都有一列。

bilingual.source: Make sure to include a separator between each column in the table.
bilingual.target: 确保在表格的每一列之间包含一个分隔符。

bilingual.source: You can set the column to autoincrement to avoid manual updates.
bilingual.target: 你可以将列设置为自动递增以避免手动更新。

bilingual.source: It has all the information on local events within the column code area.
bilingual.target: 它具有列代码区域内有关本地事件的所有信息。

bilingual.source: I looked quickly down the column of figures.
bilingual.target: 我迅速地往下看那一列数字。

bilingual.source: That figure at the bottom of the column is the total.
bilingual.target: 列底的那个数字是总数。

bilingual.source: The second column specifies the column value itself.
bilingual.target: 第 2 列指定列值本身。

list.abstract: 只读属性，返回 TextStream 文件中当前字符位置的列号。 语法： =Column(reference) 语法 object.Column object 通常是 TextStream 对象的名称。

n.(名词) [C]柱,圆柱 a tall solid upright stone post; anything similar to a column in shape, appearance [S]纵队,直行 a large number of rows of people, vehicles, etc., following one behind the other [C]栏,专栏(文章) part of a newspaper regularly dealing with a particular subject or written by the same journalist

yingyinNormal.en: And my next column to the right start ordering this point in a logical manner, arguing your point to the audience and wanting them over as like a boxing match.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来在右栏以合乎逻辑的方式列出顺序，跟观众互动就跟拳击赛有来有往一样。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: And if you order the first dish in column A, you can't order the corresponding dish in column B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你点了A栏里的第一道菜，你就不能点B栏里的第一道菜了。

yingyinNormal.en: Still keeps us in the plus column. We need to be 7 over 500. What?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们想继续待在候补区只需赢得七分。

yingyinNormal.en: You can think about Heisenberg's "uncertainty principle" much like the special order menu that you find in certain Chinese restaurants, where you have dishes in column A and other dishes in column B.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你可以觉得海森堡的"不确定性原理"就像是在某些中国餐馆里的每日特供菜单，你会发现有些菜在A栏里，有些菜在B栏里。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll put their names in bold, with different fonts, and I can use different colors for each column.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她俩的名字用不同字型的粗体字，然后每一栏可以用不同的颜色来写上。

yingyinNormal.en: Lacerated spinal column, cracked sternum, shattered collarbone, perforated liver, one hell of a headache.
yingyinNormal.zh: 脊柱受伤，胸骨断裂，锁骨粉碎，肝穿孔，头还疼得要命。

yingyinNormal.en: And its tallest is the International Commerce Center. You can take the shard and put Nelson's column on top three times and it will still be smaller.
yingyinNormal.zh: 香港最高的建筑是环球贸易广场。往夏德大厦上垒上3座纳尔逊纪念碑仍然不及它高。

yingyinNormal.en: I suspect their numbers are matching up with ours, which would put Ohio in the Republican column. Enough to make William Conway the next president of the United States.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我猜测他们收到的数字跟我们的相符，那么俄亥俄将被共和党收入囊中。足以让威廉·康威成为美国下一任总统。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a section of a newspaper or magazine regularly devoted to a particular subject or written by a particular person

examination_example.sentence: I started to write a weekly <highlight>column</highlight> about the medical journals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我开始每周写一篇关于医学期刊的专栏。

examination_example.sentence: Find information from the left <highlight>column</highlight> that corresponds to each of the marked details given in the right <highlight>column</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从左栏中查找对应于右栏中给出的每个标记细节的信息。

examination_example.sentence: There are two extra choices in the right <highlight>column</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 右栏有两个额外的选择。

sense_info_list.en: an upright pillar; a vertical, roughly cylindrical thing

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: In which <highlight>column</highlight> of a newspaper can we find the four passages above?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以在报纸的哪一栏找到上面的四段？

examination_example.sentence: The passage is probably from the People <highlight>column</highlight> of a magazine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这段话可能来自杂志的人物栏目。

examination_example.sentence: What should be included in your email to the social Q's <highlight>column</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 发送至社交 Q 专栏的电子邮件中应包含哪些内容？

examination_example.sentence: Carrying a heavy load improperly can lead to poor body position and hurt the spinal <highlight>column</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不适当地搬运重物会导致身体姿势不佳，并且伤害脊柱。
